name: Increase Fireworks Puzzle
description:
This game was made in the image of Japanese culture "Obon".
This puzzle game that can be played by small children and adults.
For recommended for brain training and education.

[How to play]
① Choose gunpowder.
Arrange these gunpowder to make fireworks.
② Explosived the Gunpowder  is  increases the hexagons to 7.
Arrange the gunpowder so that the fireworks are the same as in the example.
③ After placing all, press the "Blast" button to launched fireworks!

※Note※
This game was translated by a Japanese indie game creator.
